content: *alevins* french for fingerlings are a fun way to keep warm in the colder months and still allow for playing with toys and touch screen devices alevins are an easy knit for beginners their straightforward design allows for embellishing or showing off a gorgeous hand dyed colorway there s a wide range of sizes from 1 year 12mo to adult large and are easy enough to knit in a day this pattern assumes that knitter will know basic techniques such as casting off and on mid-project and ribbing
